/home/patois/backup.sh
```
#!/bin/bash

SITE_PATH=/opt
SITE_FOLDER=blog
USERNAME=patois
ARCHIVE_NAME=$1

tar -cvzf /home/$USERNAME/$ARCHIVE_NAME $SITE_PATH/$SITE_FOLDER
```
